item.description:
Recruiting Open House

275 Wyman Street

Waltham, MA



January 17, 2011

2:00pm – 5:00pm





Lab Pros is a scientific recruiting firm specializing in both temporary and direct hire placements. We service clients in the biotech, pharmaceutical and specialty chemical industries in and around the greater Boston area. We have many positions we are urgently seeking to fill that require Bachelors and Masters level candidates with 1-5 years of experience.



Please join us for a recruiting open house on Monday, January 17th from 2:00pm – 5:00pm to speak with our seasoned recruiters about our terrific opportunities. We are actively recruiting for the following positions:



Research Associates
Molecular Biology
Biochemistry
Pharmacology/Toxicology
Chemistry
Quality Control Analysts/Supervisors
Quality Assurance Specialists/Supervisors
Manufacturing Associates/Supervisors
Process Engineers
Lab Manager – Product Development


Please visit our website at www.labprosinc.com for job descriptions and additional open positions, as well as directions to our office. BS/MS preferred.



Please e-mail candacef@prosourceinc.com to register. Walk-ins welcome.



Applicants must have valid U.S. work authorization, no visa sponsorship is available.

Local candidates only.
item.name: Recruiting Open House
